articles.description: The latest 2022 men's NCAA tournament bracket predictions are here from Andy Katz. Find out who makes the field.
articles.content: Selection Sunday for the 2022 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament is less than one month away. With March Madness rapidly approaching, NCAA.com correspondent Andy Katz has updated his project… [+8873 chars]
